text: Mollinedia stenophylla is a species of plant in the Monimiaceae family. It is endemic to Brazil. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== * Varty, N. 1998. Mollinedia stenophylla. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
